messages.title: Dari's Proud Record
messages.content: Dari Taylor has been a tireless voice for our community in Westminster. Over the last 13 years she has delivered time and again for her constituents.

messages.title: It's a Clear Cut Choice For Stockton South
messages.content: A Tory government will make life harder for hard-working families by cutting Sure Start and Tax Credits.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour has transformed countless schools, rebuilt Thornaby town centre and introduced community policing to make your neighbourhood safer.
The Tories plan to cut £4.5 billion from the 'Building Schools for the Future' Programme
